patthana8.17:1.1_0: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:1.1_1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:1.1_2: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:2.1_0: Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:2.1_1: Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:2.1_2: Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:3.1_0: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanāsavañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:3.1_1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:3.1_2: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanāsavañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.17:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
